title: Marketplace Morning Report for Thursday, January 24, 2013
byline: Jeremy Hobson, Amy Scott and Mark Garrison
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Thursday, January 24, 2013
description: Host Jeremy Hobson reports from Miami in day three of our special Marketplace Morning Report broadcast on the theme "The Next American Dream." From WLRN's Miami studio, Jeremy holds a roundtable discussion about economic issues affecting the Miami area. And with Hispanics projected to become the majority by 2050, we take a look at one company that is uniquely positioned to grow along with the demographic group -- Univision, headquarted in Miami-Dade County.
